attributes.action: Ban the import and sale of disposable vapes
attributes.additional_details:
Disposable vapes have a massive impact to the environment With 1.3m disposable vapes ending up in landfills every week that all include a Lithium iron battery 

Disposable vapes have made it the easiest it has ever been for children to use and buy vapes due to not being regulated to sell corner shops, hairdressers and many more shops continue to sell to anyone under the age of 18
attributes.background: Ban the sale and import of all disposable vapes and one time use vapes
